Posts.EditableText:
Here I played a little bit the language definition for notepad++(7.5.1), to highlight the code to make it look prettier. 

it isn't perfect... might have missed some of the features I don't use in my coding.
probably useless if you code a lot with java.

I hope you like it

here is the link to the language file to import in notepad++:
https://ufile.io/v9z2d
